description:
* Based on a manga of the same name by http://anidb.net/cr7578 [Mashima Hiro], serialised in http://anidb.net/cr17160 [Weekly Shounen Magazine].
A young celestial mage, http://anidb.net/ch11720 [Lucy Heartfilia], runs away from home and travels to the land of Fiore to join the magical http://anidb.net/ch18752 [Fairy Tail Guild]. Along the way, she meets http://anidb.net/ch11801 [Natsu Dragneel], a teenage boy looking for his foster parent, a dragon named http://anidb.net/ch22024 [Igneel], with his best friend, http://anidb.net/ch11802 [Happy] the cat. Shortly after their meeting, Lucy is abducted by http://anidb.net/ch17613 [Bora] of Prominence, who was posing as Salamander of Fairy Tail, to be sold as a slave. Natsu rescues her and reveals that he is the real Salamander of Fairy Tail and has the skills of a Dragon Slayer, an ancient fire magic. He offers her membership into the guild, which she gladly accepts, they along with http://anidb.net/ch12249 [Erza Scarlet] — Armoured maiden, http://anidb.net/ch12250 [Gray Fullbuster] — Ice Maker, and Happy become a team performing various missions offered to the Fairy Tail guild.

REGULAR.description: Natsu Dragneel and his cat partner Happy arrive in the town of Hargeon in search of a dragon named Igneel. Meanwhile, Lucy Heartfilia, a young wizard determined to join the local wizards` guild Fairy Tail, is hypnotized by Bora, a wizard posing as the famous Salamander of Fairy Tail. Natsu and Happy inadvertently save Lucy after approaching Bora, mistaking "Salamander" for the fire dragon. Later, Bora offers membership of Fairy Tail to Lucy and invites her onto his yacht, where he reveals his plan to smuggle her and other young girls. Natsu and Happy rescue Lucy again and expose Bora as an imposter. Revealing himself to be the real Salamander, Natsu easily defeats Bora with his mastery over fire magic and invites Lucy to join Fairy Tail, which she accepts as they flee from the army.

Natsu and Happy bring Lucy to the Fairy Tail guildhall in Magnolia. Joining Fairy Tail, Lucy overhears a conversation between the guild master Makarov Dreyar and Romeo Conbolt to search for his father Macao. Unable to wait for Macao, Natsu and Happy decide to go find the wizard. Lucy travels with Natsu and Happy to Mt. Hakobe and search for Macao. They encounter a monster called a Vulcan and Lucy is captured. Natsu arrives and fights him, but is thrown out of a hole. Lucy summons Taurus to fight the Vulcan, but Natsu goes back into the mountain and inadvertently knocks out Taurus. Natsu defeats the Vulcan and find out that it took control of Macao`s body. After saving Macao, the four return to Magnolia where Romeo reunites with his father.

titles.title: Le dragon de feu, le singe et le taureau

REGULAR.description: Lucy settles into her new apartment. Unbeknown to her, Natsu and Happy enter the apartment and Lucy scolds them. She teaches the two how a wizard makes contracts with celestial spirits. Lucy summons Nicola, forms a contract with him and names him Plue. She accepts a job to steal a book entitled Daybreak from the Everlue Mansion`s corrupt owner Duke Everlue. At Fairy Tail, Makarov reviews that job has been changed to destroying the book and increased the reward. They arrive at Shirotsume and accept the request to burn the book. When Everlue rejects Lucy as a maid and insults her, the three infiltrate the mansion and successfully steal the book. However, Everlue, his maids, and his gorilla-sized celestial spirit Virgo, attacks the three. Lucy flees to the sewers, and discovers the book`s hidden secrets before being caught by Everlue. Meanwhile, Natsu takes on Everlue`s mercenaries, the Vanish Brothers, and defeats them along with Virgo.

titles.title: 潜入せよ! エバルー屋敷!

REGULAR.description: Duke Everlue is about to crush Lucy when Happy appears and ends his struggle. Lucy summons Cancer, her crab spirit. Oblivious to Natsu`s presence, Duke Everlue summons Virgo. Lucy and Cancer easily defeat him. They take the book back to Kaby, the son of the book`s author Zekua. Kaby explains that his father considered Daybreak to be the worst book he had ever written, and intends to destroy it to protect his father`s honor. However, Lucy reveals that the book contains a secret message for Kaby from his father as an apology for neglecting him over the years while writing the book for Everlue. To Lucy`s chagrin, Natsu and Happy respectfully decline the reward as Kaby does not have as much money as he claimed he would give.

titles.title: DEAR KABY[親愛なるカービィへ]

REGULAR.description:
Natsu and Lucy start looking for a new job to take, but just then Erza, the strongest female wizard in all of Fairy Tail, returns. She`s so powerful all the other people in Fairy Tail are scared stiff, and she immediately asks Natsu and Gray to come help her on a mission. Lucy tags along to keep the two of them from fighting, and on the train Erza tells the story of how she learned of the evil plans of Eisenwald, a dark guild, and how she intends on stopping them. But can the four of them really take on an entire guild by themselves?
Source: crunchyroll

Lullaby turned out to be a flute used for mass-murder curse magic, killing anyone who heard its melody!  "Shinigami" Erigor and his dark guild Eisenwald take over Oshibana station, and announces to Erza and the others who came to stop him that he would play the flute to all the people in the area. Erigor leaves to put his plan into action, and the battle begins right away with Erza taking the lead... But it seems like Erigor has some other goal in mind...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fairy Tail, au coeur de la tempête

REGULAR.description:
Eisenwald`s true goal was to play the lullaby at the place the Guild Masters are having their regular meeting! Erigor gets closer and closer to the meeting hall, while Natsu and the others are all trapped in the magic wind wall Erigor set up around the station. At this rate the Guild Masters are in trouble! But just then comes a glimmer of hope in the form of... Lucy?!
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu caught up to Erigor after breaking through the magic wind wall, but Natsu`s flames aren`t able to dent Erigor`s perfectly controlled wind! Happy figures out wind`s weakness, however, and Natsu uses his Dragon Slayer magic to stage a sudden comeback! After Lucy and the others arrive, everything would seem to be safe, but Kage suddenly takes back the flute and heads towards the Guild Masters!  It`s just one setback after another; can they ever truly stop the lullaby?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Equipe Mais Forte De Todas!!!

REGULAR.description:
Natsu and the others get lost in the depths of Clover Canyon, a great natural labyrinth, on the way back from stopping the dark guild Eisenwald`s evil schemes.  They stumble upon a suspicious looking village, but don`t care as long as they find something to eat! Food comes first! Moving houses, galloping chairs, whatever! As long as they`re edible! But this village holds a secret truth...
Source: crunchyroll

What a battle! Natsu vs. Erza!! The flames of a Dragon Slayer vs. the armored Fairy Queen! Fairy Tail is expecting fireworks; this guild settles things with their fists! Natsu`s all fired up and doesn`t give an inch to Erza, but just then... A messenger shows up from the council talking about illegal actions during the Eisenwald incident, and he has an arrest warrant for Erza?!
Source: crunchyroll

S class quests... Requests so dangerous only wizards that the master gives permission to go on them. And yet, Natsu, Lucy and Happy go off on one of these S class quests on their own without permission!  They head out to "Galuna, the cursed island," and it turns out the people there are turning into demons from the evil spell of the moon! They learn that there is only one way to undo the curse, and that`s to destroy the moon itself! But how in the world are they going to complete a request to "destroy the moon?"
Source: crunchyroll

While searching for clues on how to undo the curse on the island, they come across a suspicious temple ruin. There they discover the immortal demon, Deliora, that Gray`s old teacher Ul had sealed in the Northern Continent. A man who calls himself Reitei is using the magical power from the moon to break that seal, but when Gray hears his voice... What does Galuna`s curse have to do with Deliora, and what relation does Reitei have to Gray?! What is the true meaning behind the curse?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 月の雫[ムーンドリップ]

REGULAR.description:
Reitei Lyon`s lackeys are attacking! They`re going to dump nuke`em jelly on the village to wipe it off the map! Natsu`s really mad and faces off against a wizard that can`t be affected by magic, Yuka "The Wave," and "Paralyze Claw" Tobi!! And Lucy`s in a real jam when her Celestial Spirit gets controlled by Doll Attack magic wielding Sherry! With Gray out of the battle, with the odds against them, with match ups giving the enemy an advantage... Can Fairy Tail win?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu contre les ondes de Yuka
Natsu vs. Yuka the Wave User

REGULAR.description:
With her spirits being controlled, it doesn`t look like Lucy has a chance to win! But a Fairy Tail wizard never gives up!! She risks everything by summoning her trump card, Aquarius, and... On the other hand, Natsu heads below where Lyon is, trying to destroy the the supports and tilt the ruins to prevent Deliora from being resurrected!  It`s time for round two against the out of control Lyon! This time he`ll get pounded with some flaming fists for sure!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le gagnant fait ce qui lui plait

REGULAR.description:
The origins of Gray and Lyon are finally revealed. Ten years ago... It was Ul and Lyon that rescued Gray after his parents were killed and he was injured by Deliora. Taken in as her pupil along with Lyon, they train day and night in Creation Magic. But then Gray hears the location of Deliora, and recklessly challenges Deliora in battle. The tragedy that unfolds because of it is... Gray, burdened by his past sins, and Lyon who`s lost his dream... The time has come for the two of them to settle things!!
Source: crunchyroll

Ul gave her life to seal Deliora, and Gray is attacking in order to prevent that from happening, even if it costs him his life. On the other side of things, Natsu faces off against the masked weirdo, Zalty. Somehow Zalty used time manipulation magic to undo Natsu`s tilting of the ruins, and the Moon Drip ceremony has restarted! The ice is melting, and Deliora gives off a roar! It`s only a matter of time until the demon of disaster is resurrected... And if it does, what is Gray prepared to do to stop it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Batalha Final Na Ilha Galuna!
L’île de Galuna – La bataille finale
The Final Showdown on Galuna Island
ガルナ島 最終決戦

REGULAR.description:
Deliora`s roar echoes across the Island!! Natsu faces off against the "time manipulator" Zalty while Erza stops the ceremony above, but it`s all in vain as the immortal demon is resurrected once more! Gray decides to use the sacrificial magic, Iced Shell, to seal Deliora in eternal ice just like Ul once did before him, but Natsu stands against it! And just as its villainous fist finds Natsu and the others, events take an unexpected turn...
Source: crunchyroll

"We`re now going to destroy the moon." That`s what Erza said all matter-of-fact in front of the villagers who are still stuck in the forms of demons even though Deliora has been defeated.  Combing the throwing power of the Giant Armor and the Lance of Haja that has the power to repel darkness with the hyper acceleration of Natsu`s flames, they make an all-out attack on the moon! Erza`s full of confidence, but there`s no way it could actually reach the moon... Wait, the moon actually cracked?! What could be the unexpected hidden truth behind it all?
Source: crunchyroll

Figure out what this writing means." That`s what the poster on the request board said. But the instant someone read the ancient writing, Natsu, Lucy, and Happy switched minds with Loke, Gray, and Erza! And not only that, if this ancient spell isn`t lifted within 30 minutes, they`ll be stuck like that forever! Caught in a jam no one could have predicted, the guild is in more of an uproar than usual! What`s going to happen to everyone?!
Source: crunchyroll

Mirajane tells a story from Fairy Tail`s past, thanks to Lucy accidentally finding a drawing of Natsu, Gray, Erza, Mira, Elfman and everyone else from six years ago. But wait, where`s Happy? And why is there a dragon? The story behind the birth of the mysterious flying cat, Happy, will be revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu e o Ovo de Dragão!

REGULAR.description:
Conflict has erupted between the guilds?! Phantom Lord has hit Fairy Tail with a sneak attack! Makarov manages to get control over the furious Natsu who wants to strike back, but then the same evil befalls Levy and her team! Makarov cannot let this stand, of course, and declares war. He leads all the guild members to Phantom Lord to teach them a lesson they won`t soon forget.
Source: crunchyroll

The members of Fairy Tail are angry, and it shows in their fists! Natsu takes on the Iron Dragon Slayer Gajeel to pay him back for busting up the guild! Things are going well for them, and Master Makarov finally meets face to face with the master of Phantom Lord, Jose! But what`s this near Jose`s feet? Lucy`s been captured?! Makarov can`t hide his surprise that Jose`s true aim was capturing Lucy! What is the secret truth behind this whole confrontation?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ルーシィ・ハートフィリア

REGULAR.description:
With Makarov off the battlefield, Fairy Tail had no choice but to withdraw! Natsu and the others try to cheer up Lucy now that she realizes Phantom Lord`s goal was capturing her. Phantom Lord comes to strike the final blow, using their guild itself! And Jose tries to use the Magic Focusing Cannon, Jupiter, to erase Fairy Tail completely! Do Natsu and the others have any way to withstand the onslaught?
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu, Gray, and Elfman have infiltrated Phantom Lord`s headquarters. Although Natsu manages to destroy Jupiter and the lookout somehow, Phantom has yet another trump card! Incredibly, the guild itself transforms into the magical giant Phantom Mk II, and starts casting the forbidden magic Abyss Break trying to wipe out the entire guild at once. With no time to spare, a member of the Element 4 appears before Elfman!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Para que ninguém possa ver as lágrimas
Pour ne pas voir tes larmes
Sono Namida o Minai Tame ni
To Keep from Seeing Those Tears

REGULAR.description:
Elfman crushes Sol of the Land, one of the Element 4! Afterwards, the Phantom Mk II seems to slow down for some reason. That`s because the giant moves using the power of the Element 4. If all of the Element 4 are defeated, they can stop Abyss Break! There are only two left! Natsu faces off against Aria of the Heavens and Gray faces off against Juvia of the Deep! There`s almost no time left until Abyss Break is finished casting! What will be the outcome of Fairy Tail`s life-or-death struggle?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Flower Blooms in the Rain
Ame no Naka ni Saku Hana
La fleur qui s`épanouit sous la pluie

REGULAR.description:
Natsu challenges Aria of the Heavens with plenty of vigor, but faced with Aria`s Airspace magic he can`t even make a dent, and the fight is completely one-sided. Just then, somehow Erza arrives, despite being almost mortally wounded earlier! Does a wounded Erza even have a chance to win against the one known as the strongest of the Element 4? Elsewhere, Lucy is recaptured by Gajeel! Phantom Lord gathers its strength... What will be the next stage in this epic struggle?!
Source: crunchyroll

The two Dragon Slayers clash fist-to-fist! Natsu challenges Gajeel with fists full of anger, furious at what he`s done to Lucy. A battle between two Dragon Slayers is as fierce as one between two dragons themselves! But Natsu, exhausted from his serious of battles with the Element 4, begins to be pressured by Gajeel, and the fight slowly goes in Phantom Lord`s direction... Under this intense battle, what will become of Fairy Tail?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 二人の滅竜魔導士[ドラゴンスレイヤー]

REGULAR.description:
The powerful foes of the Element 4 and Iron Dragon Gajeel have been crushed by Natsu and the gang! All that`s left is Jose, named as one of the Ten Wizard Saints. Erza puts everything on her own shoulders and challenges him, but faced with his overwhelming magical power it was only a matter of time until she was defeated. But just then, Makarov returns after having regained his magical power! This battle which has caused such sadness... With anger and pride in his heart, what spell does Makarov pull out?! The light of righteousness will now pass judgment upon thee!!
Source: crunchyroll

The war against Phantom Lord with the guild`s pride on the line has now been over for a week. The biggest scar left was the destroyed guild, and with reconstruction commencing Fairy Tail gets back to normal. But the targeted Lucy with painful memories of her father leaves a note that says she`s going home! Loving Fairy Tail as much as she does, what could her intentions be?
Source: crunchyroll

The next generation lies on the shoulders of the young. Fairy Tail has candidates for the next master like Laxus and Erza, but Makarov doesn`t feel the time is quite right yet to give up his position. Then, Fairy Tail`s strongest team, centered around Erza, goes on a mission! In high spirits, they set out to handle the request to help put on a play... Or so they thought, because it seems there`s been a casting change! Could this actually be entertaining to everyone?
Source: crunchyroll

Everyone heads to the spa town of Hosenka for some R&R after a job. There, the gang coincidentally runs into Loke! As usual, Loke keeps his distance from Lucy, but something is different about him from before... Then, suddenly, Loke makes a stunning confessions to Lucy! His incredible, unspeakable truth is... Loke`s secrets that no one knows will be revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Star Removed from the Sky
A estrela que não pode retornar ao céu!

REGULAR.description:
Loke`s crime was breaking the law of the Spirit World in order to protect his friend. As a result, Loke is forbidden to return to the Spirit World and his life-force is slowly eroding away. Loke wishes to disappear from the world in order to repent for his sins, but Lucy, who loves all spirits, won`t stand for it! "Caring for your friends is not a crime!" she cries, but will it reach all the way to the Spirit World?
Source: crunchyroll

Some Fairy R&R?! In other words, Natsu and the others are forgetting about work and spreading their wings on the beach! But, it only felt like a vacation for a short while, as they suddenly are faced with a crisis: Erza and Happy are kidnapped! However, the bunch that did it used to be Erza`s "friends"! Erza`s hidden past will now begin to rock the world to its core! And what is this "Tower of Heaven" that they are headed toward?
Source: crunchyroll

Erza has an unexpected connection to Jellal, who used to be her comrade in the past. He rules over the Tower of Heaven, aka the R-system, in other words a forbidden magic used to resurrect someone from the dead! While Natsu and the gang try and infiltrate the tower to save Erza and Happy without really knowing what`s going on, the Council, now aware of the tower`s existence, begins to make a frightful decision in order to destroy it...
Source: crunchyroll

Erza`s secret past... In return for battling for her freedom from forced labor, she "loses" Jellal! Possessed by the black wizard Zeref, Jellal turns into evil itself... What is the sad truth that lays between him and Erza? Meanwhile, the Council continues their deliberations as to whether to use their ultimate weapon of destruction, Etherion! Everyone is headed to an uncertain fate!
Source: crunchyroll

Jellal is trying to use Erza as the living sacrifice in the ceremony to resurrect Zeref. He starts a battle royal between Natsu and the others with the three wizards "Trinity Raven" from the Assassin`s Guild, and names it "Heaven`s Game."  And not only that, it`s a battle where everyone`s life could end at any moment if the Magic Council fires Etherion! With Jellal watching over everything with an evil grin on his face, the battle moves on to the next stage!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s Heaven`s Game where your life is on the line! Natsu faces off against the birdbrained "Warrior of Justice" Fukurou, while Lucy and Juvia battle the punk hair-flinging rocker Vidaldus Taka! They might seem silly, but as members of the Assassin`s Guild they mean serious business! Faced with such odd forms of magic, the battles take an unexpected turn! Can Natsu and the others find the light of hope that can free Erza from her past while a strike from Etherion looms?
Source: crunchyroll

With Vidaldus Taka defeated, only Ikaruga of Trinity Raven remains! Erza stands strong in her resolve, but the flashes of the sword Ikaruga draws are amazingly able to shatter even Erza`s powerful armor! Etherion begins counting down, and there is barely any time left before it fires. Will Erza defeat this powerful foe and make it to Jellal in time?!
Source: crunchyroll

Finally, the time has come... With only Natsu, Erza, and Jellal left in the Tower of Heaven, Etherion comes raining down! But in the instant everyone cries out for the victims, something amazing occurs! The outside of the tower is destroyed, revealing it to be a giant lacrima! The council had been used by Jellal in his fiendish plot! The unbelievable truth behind Jellal will be revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Give Our Prayers to the Sacred Light
Une prière pour la lumière sainte

REGULAR.description:
Natsu vs. Jellal! Natsu is hardly able to scratch Jellal, having regained his true magical powers. So, deciding to just try and destroy the tower itself, he angers Jellal who launches the ultimate Heavenly Body Magic, "Altairis," deciding to destroy Erza and Natsu together! They`re in serious trouble, as anything in the path of that spell is doomed! Is this the time for Natsu to finally show his true worth as a Dragon Slayer?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La chute de la reine des fées
妖精女王[ティターニア], 散る

REGULAR.description:
With the Tower of Heaven destroyed, the curse of Erza`s past has been lifted, and Sho and the others decide to try going off on their own.  When Natsu and the others get back to Magnolia, they find waiting for them a Fairy Tail reborn! It`s awesome, with a pool, and a game parlor... However, even though the guild is new, the people inside are just as rambunctious as ever. Just then, the big dog returns, and he ain`t satisfied with the way things are with the guild...
Source: crunchyroll

The entire city of Magnolia is busy preparing for the Harvest Festival, and no place is busier than Fairy Tail itself! Every year they put on a magnificent parade called the "Fantasia" which people come from all around the continent to see!  Lucy, however, is more worried about how she`s going to pay next month`s rent, and decides to enter the Miss Fairy Tail contest to earn some money before the parade.  Here come all the beauties of Fairy Tail, doing their best to appeal to the audience!  But just then a new contestant appears, and she`s got the competition frozen stiff...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バトル・オブ・フェアリーテイル

REGULAR.description:
The Battle of Fairy Tail moves into high gear, and contestants are falling left and right... And they`re all members of Fairy Tail! Forced to fight each other to save their friends, the Fairy Tail Wizards` backs are up against a wall... With the weakest out of the way, the Raijin Tribe themselves start to join in the mix, and they aren`t Laxus`s personal guard for nothing! Meanwhile, Natsu can`t get out of the guild and Erza has been turned to stone... Is there anyone left strong enough to defeat them?! The battle begins to look hopeless, until...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attaque ton ami pour le sauver
Defeat Your Friends to Save Your Friends
Tomo no Tame ni Tomo o Ute

REGULAR.description:
Erza`s back and she`s ready to end the Battle of Fairy Tail once and for all! Facing off against Evergreen, Erza knows that if she takes this Raijin Tribe member out, the rest of the stone statue hostages will return to normal, and that means Game Over for Laxus!  But things don`t go as simply as planned, for Laxus has a backup plan up his sleeve... Above Magnolia are floating countless number of thunder lacrima, primed and charged to rain lightning down on the innocent people below. They`re Laxus`s ultimate weapon, the Thunder Palace!  Can Fairy Tail recoup, find Laxus, and defeat him before time runs out?
Source: crunchyroll

The Battle of Fairy Tail rages on as the newly revived female Fairy Tail wizards search for Laxus before the Thunder Palace activates and rains destruction down on Magnolia! Loke shows up in the nick of time to help Lucy in her battle with Bickslow, but Bickslow still has a few tricks up his sleeves! Meanwhile Cana and Juvia encounter Freed, but get caught in one of his rune traps and are forced to fight one another! Mirajane finds Elfman, seriously injured after his defeat by Evergreen, but when Elfman tries to join back in the fight, Freed shows him what happens to anyone who breaks his rules. Seeing her brother suffering so much, something long dormant awakens inside of Mirajane...
Source: crunchyroll

With the master collapsed, and Magnolia minutes away from being completely destroyed by the Thunder Palace, Erza and Natsu desperately search Magnolia to find Laxus and stop him. Waiting in Kardia Cathedral, Laxus is first visited by the mysterious and powerful Fairy Tail S class wizard, Mystogan. As they battle, Natsu and Erza show up, and Mystogan ends up showing his face to the one he least wanted to see... Will the strongest in Fairy Tail finally be decided this time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Catastrophe à la cathédrale de Kaldia
激突! カルディア大聖堂

REGULAR.description:
Finally, the showdown between Natsu and Laxus begins to determine just who the strongest wizard is in Fairy Tail! Meanwhile, Erza is in a battle against time to destroy all the hundreds of lacrima floating above Magnolia, moments away from raining destruction on the unsuspecting townspeople. Even Erza realizes she doesn`t have enough power to destroy all of them at once, and just when things look grim, a voice calls out... Meanwhile, Natsu gives it his best against Laxus, but faced with such overwhelming power his attacks seem to do nothing. Might even Natsu have to get some help to protect the guild he loves?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: トリプル ドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
Laxus has invoked Fairy Law, the ultimate spell of his grandfather`s that passes judgment upon all whom the caster deems an enemy. But as if a miracle, no one in the guild or Magnolia seems to be affected at all? Could Laxus have made a mistake casting the spell? Or is there some deeper reason that saved everyone from destruction? And more importantly, can Fairy Tail regroup in time to put on their big parade, the Fantasia?! The Battle of Fairy Tail comes to its shocking conclusion...
Source: crunchyroll

The Harvest Festival is over, and things at the guild have returned to normal... Well, normal for Fairy Tail, that is, since everyone is making a huge fuss over a reporter from the Weekly Sorcerer that`s coming to do a special report!  At the same time, Cana tells Lucy this fortune "My cards tell me that today you will have a fateful encounter." Is Lucy`s love life going to get a jump start when two young men, the reporter for the magazine and a novelist, show up in front of her? Who could be Lucy`s fated partner!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Day of the Fateful Encounter
Une rencontre marquée par le destin

REGULAR.description:
There`s more strange happenings at Fairy Tail! Mira says that Natsu might be in love with Lucy, which causes Lucy`s heart to race... At the same time, Juvia tries to fulfill her tender heart`s painful unrequited love for Gray by using a forbidden magic potion! But could this potion bring Fairy Tail to the brink of destruction?! Everyone`s making a giant fuss over love, but how will it all end?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mission spéciale. Prends garde à l`être aimé
Missão Especial: Cuidado Com O Menino Que Gosta!
Special Request: Watch Out for the Guy You Like!
Tokubetsu Irai. Ki ni Naru Kare ni Chuui Seyo!
特別依頼. 気になる彼に注意せよ!

REGULAR.description:
A suspicious shadow tails close behind Lucy... Why, it`s Lucy`s father, completely changed! His business and all his money were completely taken from him. Lucy ends up turning away her father when he desperately begs for money. But the trade guild that he is heading to in order to start over is attacked! "He may be that man... But even so, I have to save him!" Lucy goes to save the only father she`s got!
Source: crunchyroll

The most powerful force of the Dark Guilds is the "Baram Alliance"!! It looks like one of the key members, the Dark Guild Oracion Seis, has started making some seriously worrying moves. And to counter it, Fairy Tail is teaming up with three other official guilds to form their own alliance!  All gathered up, the group has a bad-boy, a gigolo, a narcissist, and... a kid?!
Source: crunchyroll

Oracion Seis is trying to get their hands on a powerful magic sealed away by the ancients called "Nirvana." And in order to stop them, the allied forces are about to set their plan into action, but they`re already playing into the enemy`s hands! With their guard down, both Jura and Ichiya are out for the count, and even their supposed trump card, the magical bomber, crashes in flames right before Natsu`s eyes! Then, with no hesitation, all of Oracion Seis shows up right in front of everyone! It`s the Allied Forces verses the Six Wizard Generals! Wait, right off the bat?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 六魔将軍[オラシオンセイス]現る!

REGULAR.description:
Wendy is actually the Sky Dragon Slayer, and she can use Healing Magic! But she and Happy are taken away by Oracion Seis... Natsu and the rest follow them to get Wendy back, so she can save Erza from the poison she was hit with in the last battle, however Oracion Seis has their own plans to get Wendy to heal "that person who holds the key to Nirvana..." And you`ll never guess who that person is!
Source: crunchyroll

The alliance hurries to rescue the captured Wendy, but a number of Dark Guilds are standing in their way! Somehow Natsu kicks the butts of the powerful foes in his way and reaches the place where Wendy and Happy are, but there he comes face to face with someone he could never have imagined encountering! Before him is Jellal, who was supposed to have been engulfed in Etherion and vanished at the Tower of Heaven! Jellal then leaves on his own... His appearance has turned everything willy-nilly!
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu is heading back with Wendy, who holds the key to saving Erza, while Gray is facing off against one of the cornerstones of Oracion Seis, Racer! But things go beyond just his overwhelming speed, and heat up into an all-out magic motorcycle race, the Dead Grand Prix! Gray`s got guts taking on the enemy on his own turf, but then his old fellow pupil Lyon shows up. With the two them working in sync, can they find a way to steal his speed?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le grand prix de la mort

REGULAR.description:
Erza`s life is saved thanks to Wendy`s Healing Magic! Natsu and the others are overjoyed, but just then, from the center of the Worth Woodsea, a pillar of black light rises up! Could that be Nirvana? Natsu doesn`t waste a single moment and dashes off toward the light. Meanwhile, the member of Oracion Seis known as Midnight is now awake. While the situation gets even more chaotic, the fearsome truth of Nirvana is revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

Nirvana... A fearsome magic that switches darkness and light! Lucy and Hibiki, who knows about this, hurry to chase after Natsu and Erza, but one of Oracion Seis, the Celestial Wizard Angel, stands in their way! Lucy can`t stand the way that Angel thinks of her Spirits as nothing more than tools. But before the more powerful Angel, Lucy is brought to her knees! Her back to the wall, facing defeat, Lucy`s feelings for her Spirits call forth something amazing...
Source: crunchyroll

"Jellal is alive..." Knowing the shocking truth, the revived Erza aims straight for Jellal. And then the two meet again... But the Jellal she knew isn`t the one that`s there! This Jellal is changed completely... What could be the reason why he unlocked Nirvana`s seal? And his shocking, heroic determination is...
Source: crunchyroll

Jellal has cast a self-destruction magic circle on himself! He thought he would be able to destroy Nirvana that way. However, Brain of Oracion Seis suddenly appears, removes the self-destruction magic circle easily... and Nirvana is finally reborn! Nirvana, ruled by wickedness... Soon darkness will rise over the world... But everyone`s hopes are still connected! Natsu and the others refuse to give up, and challenge the darkness of Oracion Seis!
Source: crunchyroll

Nirvana has been activated once again! In order to stop it, Natsu and Happy show up in front of Brain, but one of Oracion Seis, Cobra, stands in their way. Natsu and Happy vs. Cobra and his poison snake Cubellios in a giant mid-air battle! With all his attacks being "heard", nothing Natsu tries seems to work. But the shocking truth about Cobra may lead to the final blow!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Super Aerial Battle: Natsu vs. Cobra!
Super Batalha Aérea! Natsu Vs Cobra!
Un combat aérien : Natsu vs. Cobra !
超空中戦! ナツvs. コブラ

REGULAR.description:
Nirvana is an ultra inversion magic that switched light and darkness! And for some reason Brain from Oracion Seis is heading toward Wendy`s guild, Caitshelter, trying to destroy it! But standing against the evil Brain is Jura of Lamia Scale, and he`s seriously angry! Can the power of someone bestowed with the title of Wizard Saint defeat Brain and stop Nirvana?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 聖十[せいてん]のジュラ

REGULAR.description:
Erza and Jellal take on the final member of Oracion Seis, Midnight! But he`s so powerful he even defeats Jellal easily! Erza suffers under Midnight`s "Reflector" magic that is capable of bending and warping anything... Facing the most powerful member of Oracion Seis, can they find any chance for victory?
Source: crunchyroll

Oracion Seis has been wiped out! Natsu and the Alliance have, after a fierce struggle, come out victorious... But, could it just be the beginning of an even greater life and death battle? Incredibly, when all six of Oracion Seis fall, they release the Body Link magic cast on Brain that seals away his alternate personality, the guild master of Oracion Seis, Zero! Zero loves destruction, and holds immense, evil magic power... With Caitshelter in sight, Natsu and the gang do battle with the most powerful foe they`ve ever faced!
Source: crunchyroll

Nirvana fired on Caitshelter! But, in the nick of time, Hibiki and the others appear in the magical bomber Christina, and block the attack.  And furthermore, they know the way that Nirvana can be stopped!  Hibiki tells everyone that the way to stop Nirvana is to destroy the lacrima in each of the six legs simultaneously. Everyone is covered in battle wounds, but they still haven`t given up hope! Can Natsu and the gang stop Zero`s evil ambitions?
Source: crunchyroll

The Alliance heads out to stop Nirvana, even though they are bruised and battered to the point of barely being able to stand...  Natsu uses his nose to pick the lacrima where the strongest enemy awaits him, Master Zero! Zero and Natsu are both rarin` for a fight, but Natsu has reached the limits of his magic power, and he`s in serious trouble. But then Jellal shows up, even though he should have headed to a different lacrima, and attacks Natsu with magic. Has Jellal fallen to the darkness yet again? What will Natsu do when his back`s against the wall?
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu, with his true Dragon Slayer`s powers unleashed, finally crushes the lacrima and Master Zero! The rest of the lacrima are destroyed by his partners, and Nirvana thunderously crashes to the ground! With their victory secured, the alliance picks themselves back up. But, someone has set up runes, trapping Natsu and the others! The identity of the person who imprisoned them is the Captain of the Reformed Magic Council`s 4th Enforcement and Detention Corps. What does he want, after appearing out of the blue?!
Source: crunchyroll

Even if you lose your memories, that does not absolve your sins... The aim of the Reformed Magic Council wasn`t just Oracion Seis, but to capture Jellal! Seeing Erza`s expression as she grapples with that reality, the rest of Fairy Tail springs into action to stop his arrest. What is Erza`s answer, as she watches over it all? 
Then, Wendy and the others return to the guild Caitshelter, where Master Robaul tells them the shocking truth. What is Caitshelter`s big secret?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tatta Hitori no Tame no Guild
Uma Guilda Pelo Bem De Um Só!
Une guilde fondée pour une personne
たった一人の為のギルド

REGULAR.description:
Natsu and the others have returned to Fairy Tail after their long mission. The friendly, familial atmosphere heals all their fatigue from the fierce battles they had. Wendy and Carla join up, and the entire guild is in high spirits!
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu and the others came to the traveler`s inn Rise after getting info from Gray, but what was awaiting them there was a trap by Daphne, and now they can`t get out of the inn! And why did Gray...?
Source: crunchyroll

Daphne`s goal was to capture Natsu, and use him to power her the artificial dragon she created through long years of research, the Dragonoid! The Dragonoid sucks out Natsu`s Dragon Slayer magic, but then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`amitié est plus forte que la mort
友は屍[しかばね]を越えて

REGULAR.description:
Erza and the others hear Natsu cry out "Bust this thing up, and me along with it!" At the same time, the master hears the truth from Gray. Will Natsu`s power all be sucked into the Dragonoid?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フェアリーテイルの魔導士

REGULAR.description:
Lucy is all excited for the big event that only comes once a year, the Fairy Tail hanami party! But before that she heads up Mt. Hakobe with Natsu and the gang for what she thought would be an easy request...
Source: crunchyroll

Wendy`s gotten used to doing jobs at Fairy Tail and wants to try taking on something bigger so she can be more help to everyone, but gets into an argument with Carla over it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ウェンディ, 初めての大仕事!?

REGULAR.description:
Once a year, the master holds a mandatory 24-hour long road race for all the members of Fairy Tail. Jet seems to be a shoe-in to take the victory again this year, but the real competition is making sure not to come in last, because that wizard must face an unspeakable punishment from the master himself! For this day only, the Fairy Tail Wizards aren`t allies, but bitter rivals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les vingt quatre heures à pied de Fairy Tail

REGULAR.description:
Fairy Tail is going along without trouble, when all of a sudden an alarm rings out, and Natsu and the rest erupt in jubilation! Yes, Fairy Tail`s strongest wizard, Gildarts, has returned!
Source: crunchyroll

With Gajeel searching for his own cat and Natsu sound asleep, Fairy Tail is unusually peaceful. Why then is Carla the only one that seems apprehensive? Does she know something that the others don`t?
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu and Happy, along with Wendy and Carla, are the only ones left after Fairy Tail, guild and all, is sucked into an alternate world named Edolas! What`s more, Carla seems to know something about what happened...
Source: crunchyroll

Edolas... It`s almost like a parallel world! A different world with a different culture and history from Earthland... And in it exists a completely "different" Fairy Tail?!
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu and Wendy have come to Edolas to rescue their friends who have been absorbed for their magic power! But traveling in Edolas, a land where magic can`t be used freely, Natsu quickly attracts trouble...
Source: crunchyroll

Who appears before Natsu and the gang, but none other than Earthland Lucy! Sent to Edolas by Mystogan, she can somehow still use her magic, and successfully drives away the Royal Army forces!
Source: crunchyroll

Our heroes reach the Royal City, where Edolas`s dictator King Faust reveals his evil plans for the lacrima that was once all the people of Magnolia! Natsu and Lucy can barely hold back their anger, but is there some way to approach the castle without being caught by the army?
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu and Wendy are thrown in jail, while Lucy is taken to be executed! Meanwhile, Happy and Carla find themselves in Extalia, the kingdom of the Exceeds... But to their shock, Extalia is a land filled with cats like them! Heralded as heroes for completing their duty, Happy and Carla are escorted to the Queen, but what exactly was their duty to begin with anyway? The shocking truth is...
Source: crunchyroll

Happy and Carla run from their fate, and Happy declares "We`re going to save our friends!" When the two are chased, the Exceed couple which gives them shelter is...
Source: crunchyroll

Happy and Carla have learned the truth about their origins and realized that they, Exceeds, are the only creatures in Edolas that have magic power within their bodies! Meanwhile, the Queen has ordered Lucy to be executed, and the evil Byron has sinister plans for the two Dragon Slayers, Natsu and Wendy. Will they make it in time?!
Source: crunchyroll

Just in time, who appears before the captured Lucy? Gray and Erza! Gajeel`s Dragon Slayer Magic somehow resurrected them from the giant lacrima! But then, an epic battle breaks out between the two Erzas. Meanwhile, King Faust has a truly sinister plan for the magic power he extracted from Natsu and Wendy...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: エルザ vs. エルザ

REGULAR.description:
Natsu, Lucy, and Gray hurry to strike down Edolas`s King Faust before he can execute Code ETD! But standing in their way are the Royal Army`s Hughes and Sugar Boy!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s Lucy vs. Bydo and Gray vs. Sugar Boy in a mad dash for the key to the Dragon Chain Cannon! Edolas plans to use it to ram the lacrima into Extalia, so the Fairy Tail gang goes all out to make sure that key never falls back into King Faust`s hands!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For Pride`s Sake, the River of Stars
Hoshi no Taiga wa Hokori no Tame ni
Orgulhe-Se Do Grande Rio De Estrelas!
Pour la fierté du fleuve étoilé
星の大河は誇りの為に

REGULAR.description:
ith Sugar Boy, Bydo, and Hughes all defeated, Gray and Natsu try to figure out a way to get to the Dragon Chain Cannon and use it to save everyone, instead of using it to ram the lacrima into Extalia like King Faust intends. But the room is sealed with an anti-wizard barrier, and time is running out! Just then, Erza appears, but is it the Erza that brings hope, or despair?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le harpon du dragon de l`apocalypse

REGULAR.description:
The Dragon Chain Cannon has been fired, and the floating island with the giant lacrima is hurtling toward Extalia! Can Natsu and the others stop it in time? Back on Extalia, the Queen is notified of the incoming threat... Will the Queen, said to have the power of God, finally show her hand to strike down the rebelling humans?
Source: crunchyroll

Extalia might be saved, and the giant lacrima sent back to Earthland, but trouble isn`t over yet for Edolas, because Erza Knightwalker and her Legion squadron of the Royal Army are here to spoil everyone`s celebration!
Source: crunchyroll

Lucy, Gray, Happy and Carla are surrounded by the Legion Regiment of the Royal Army, while Natsu, Wendy, and Gajeel are facing a forbidden super weapon that repels all magic, piloted by King Faust himself, and Erza has her final showdown with Erza Knightwalker... Exhausted, outnumbered, and on unfamiliar turf, the Fairy Tail wizards have it tough... Is there anyone in Edolas willing to fight for the future of their own country? And what is the prince of Edolas, Mystogan, doing in the Anima Control Room?
Source: crunchyroll

With the Royal Army being beating back by Edolas`s Fairy Tail, and Edolas Erza out of action, it`s up to the Dragon Slayers to take out Droma Anim, King Faust`s ultimate magic weapon... But it just keeps sucking up more magic power and getting stronger! Can the Dragon Slayers work together and win? Meanwhile, Prince Jellal starts a giant Anima in reverse, sucking all magic power out of Edolas and into Earthland! Did he save the world only to destroy it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ore wa Koko ni Tatte Iru
オレはここに立っている

REGULAR.description:
Mystogan, or Prince Jellal as the people from Edolas know him, has set Anima in reverse and all the magic power of Edolas is being sucked into Earthland! But Panther Lily can`t bring himself to go along with Jellal`s plan to sacrifice himself to make Lily as the new king... However the only way to calm the people is to set up a battle between a villain and a hero... Suddenly, a trio of evil-doers shows up wrecking havoc in the city, claiming to have stolen away Edolas`s magic power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バイバイ エドラス

REGULAR.description:
The Fairy Tail gang is back safe in Earthland, but they`ve got a whole flock of flying cats as a souvenir! Carla still hasn`t forgiven them for the brainwashing and kill the Dragon Slayers mission they gave her, but perhaps there`s more to it than meets the eye?
Source: crunchyroll

Lead In: Natsu and company return to see the guild as lively as ever, with everyone celebrating Lisanna`s return. Meanwhile, in Edolas, Mystogan makes the first steps to rebuilding the kingdom and healing the wounds of the past...
Source: crunchyroll

Things are back to normal around Fairy Tail and everyone is busy going about doing jobs... or actually, some people are working harder than ever before! The Master has some kind of big announcement to make and Lucy`s really curious what all the hubbub is about... It`s time for the once a year, S Class Wizard Advancement Exam! But who will the Master pick to be eligible to participate, and who will they pick as their partners?
Source: crunchyroll

Eight wizard duos travel to an island rich with magic - but only one wizard will be given S-Class ranking.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un ga Ii no wa Dare?

REGULAR.description:
In a tunnel below Tenroujima, Natsu runs into Gildarts, the strongest wizard in Fairy Tail. Gildarts aims to teach Natsu a lesson he`ll never forget, even if it means failing Natsu at the S Class Wizard Advancement Exam...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ナツ vs. ギルダーツ

REGULAR.description:
The teams arrive on Tenroujima and the first test of the S Class Wizard Advancement Exam begins! There are 8 paths to choose from, and luck determines just who breezes through and who has to face Erza, Gildarts, or Mirajane!
Source: crunchyroll

The guild comes across a strange person in the forest who has a deadly magic power and seems to recognize Natsu. Meanwhile, the strongest of the dark guilds - Grimoire Heart - approaches the island, and they`ve got plans for the mysterious wizard.
Source: crunchyroll

Advanced forces from Grimoire Heart have shown up on Tenroujima, Fairy Tail`s holy grounds! Running into Levy and Gajeel would seem like bad luck, but these lackeys are a cut above! It`s an all out guild war, and this time Gajeel is on Fairy Tail`s side!
Source: crunchyroll

With Grimoire Heart closing in, Master Makarov makes a stand.  Meanwhile, Mest isn`t the only intruder on the island, as one of the Seven Kin of Purgatory, Azuma, shows up with a bang! The war has only begun...
Source: crunchyroll

Fairy Tail deals with Grimoire Heart`s grunts, while Makarov confronts his old master, Purehitol, now known as Hades.  Will this be Makarov`s last stand?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 失われた魔法[ロストマジック]

REGULAR.description:
Natsu faces off against Zancrow, one of Master Hade`s specially trained Wizards, the 7 Kin of Purgatory! Zancrow proclaims himself to be a God Slayer, with control of flames that even Natsu can`t eat! Meanwhile, the rest of Fairy Tail is scattered and facing their own challengers. Is there any way for Natsu to win?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dragon de feu contre dieu du feu
Fogo Do Dragão Vs Fogo Dos Deuses!

REGULAR.description:
Mirajane faces off against Azuma, but does she have the strength to win anymore? Meanwhile, Ultear closes in on Zeref, and Grimoire Heart`s true objective is revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Monde de la Grande Magie

REGULAR.description:
Elfman and Evergreen still have trouble with their teamwork, but they somehow manage to work together to get the upper hand on Rustyrose. But just when they think they have him cornered, he keeps putting out some other crazy magic! How can they fight against someone who has the ability to turn anything he says into reality?! Meanwhile, Loke realizes the true nature of Caprico, and challenges him to a one-on-one battle!
Source: crunchyroll

Caprico and Loke face off, Spirit against Spirit! But with Caprico`s control over Human Gates, can Loke win? Meanwhile, Natsu faces off with Ultear, and Erza and Juvia mix it up with Meldy while the rest of Fairy Tail regroups...
Source: crunchyroll

Lucy`s been knocked out by Cana, and wakes up to a big surprise! Kain Hikaru, one of the 7 Kin of Purgatory, is going to use his creepy voodoo magic to stomp her flat! But turnabout is fair play, in love and magic!
Source: crunchyroll

Fairy Tail regroups a little, while Grimoire Hearts debates sending in their greatest warrior... Meanwhile, Erza and Juvia face off against Meldy, whose Maguilty Sense Lost Magic uses her own opponent`s emotions against them! Will Juvia`s love for Gray give her the strength to win, or lead her to defeat?
Source: crunchyroll

Juvia and Meldy`s senses have been linked with Gray`s! Now, no matter which one of them is killed, Gray will die as well! Is there a way to escape from this love-hate triangle of death? Meanwhile, the second in command of Grimoire Heart joins the battle, making a grave situation even more weighty!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes d`amour et de vie
Lágrimas De Amor E De Força!

REGULAR.description:
Natsu and the others do battle with Bluenote, but they are no match for his powers over gravity. Meanwhile, Cana discovers Mavis`s grave, and the true reason for her striving so hard to become an S class wizard is revealed! But will it matter if everyone is crushed by Bluenote?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce que je n`ai pas pu lui dire
The One Thing I Couldn`t Say

REGULAR.description:
Gildarts and Bluenote square off, while Erza and Azuma face each other at the roots of the Tenrou Tree. But time is running out for Fairy Tail, as Master Hades had a trump card in his pocket the whole time! The battle of Tenroujima ventures into its final stages!
Source: crunchyroll

Azuma has felled the giant Tenrou Tree, and is stealing the magic power from all the Fairy Tail wizards on the island! He challenges Erza to a one-on-one duel, with the lives of all her fellow guild members hanging in the balance. Can Erza muster the power to protect her friends? Or does true strength come from something else?
Source: crunchyroll

With Azuma defeated, all the Fairy Tail wizards get their magic power back! It`s comeback time on Tenroujima, and Gildarts, Fried, and Bickslow are going to show the remaining fighters from Grimoire Heart how stubborn Fairy Tail can be! Meanwhile, Ultear tells Gray the truth behind her actions, and begs him to defeat Hades and fulfill her mother`s dream...
Source: crunchyroll

It`s Ul`s pupil vs. Ul`s daughter! What is Ultear really after and why has she turned against her own flesh and blood? The final battle with the leader of the 7 Kin of Purgatory comes to its thrilling conclusion!
Source: crunchyroll

Juvia chases Meredy as she carries Zeref before they run into Zancrow, who takes Zeref and cruelly reveals to Meredy that Ultear was responsible for destroying her home. Suddenly, Zeref awakens, utters the name "Acnologia", and unleashes a deadly wave of magic that kills Zancrow and knocks out Juvia and Meredy. Overhearing the commotion, Dranbalt warns the rest of the Magic Council troops, who retreat from the island. Meanwhile, Natsu, Lucy, Wendy, Happy, Carla, and Lily regroup with Gray and Erza. The exceeds infiltrate the Grimoire Heart airship to destroy its power source while the others take on Hades directly. Despite them fighting at full strength, Hades is unfazed by their attacks and prepares to kill Natsu, but is stopped by the timely arrival of Laxus.

Laxus furiously battles Hades to avenge Makarov. Their fight rages until Hades gravely injures Laxus, so he transfers his own lightning magic to Natsu and tells him to defeat Hades. Meanwhile, the rest of the uninjured Fairy Tail members defend their wounded master and friends from Kain Hikaru, Kawazu, and Yomazu.

Despite using Laxus`s lightning power to its fullest, Natsu`s attacks continue to have no effect on Hades. Rather, Hades awakens the true depths of his magic power before the powerless Fairy Tail wizards, immobilizing them with fear. However, Natsu bolsters his friends with the same words of courage Gildarts had given them during the exam, and leads them in one final assault against Hades. Meanwhile, Happy, Charle, and Panther Lily stumble across a mechanical heart on the ship and try to destroy it.

The mechanical heart Happy and Charl destroy turns out to be giving Hades his power. Ultear uses her magic to return the Tenrou Tree to its original state, allowing Natsu, Lucy, Gray, Erza, Wendy, and Laxus to finally defeat the now powerless Hades. Makarov and the other injured guildmates return and order Grimoire Heart to leave Tenrou Island. As the Fairy Tail wizards celebrate and recover from their fight, Hades and the other defeated Grimoire Heart members discover Zeref on their ship.

titles.title: Le jour se lève sur Tenrôjima

REGULAR.description: Zeref reveals to Hades that his power had never been sealed to begin with, making Grimoire Heart`s efforts to reawaken him pointless. Accusing Hades of summoning the dragon called Acnologia through his guild`s actions, Zeref kills him. Ultear, meanwhile, confesses to Meredy about destroying her hometown and tries to drown herself out of guilt, but Meredy rescues and forgives her. On Tenrou Island, Makarov postpones the S-Class exam because of the battle, and Cana finally tells Gildarts that she is his daughter. As this happens, Acnologia forebodingly flies towards Tenrou Island as Zeref watches in alarm.

Acnologia appears on Tenrou Island and begins destroying everything in sight. Makarov tries to hold Acnologia off for his guild to escape, but they refuse to let their master die and help him fight the dragon. Everyone holds hands with one another to try and cast a defensive spell against Acnologia`s breath attack, which seemingly obliterates the island. Seven years pass with the Fairy Tail members on the island missing and presumed dead.

With their strongest members gone for seven years, the Fairy Tail guild has become the weakest wizards` guild in Fiore, indebted to and bullied by Twilight Ogre, a new local guild. The remaining Fairy Tail members are visited by Ichiya and the Tri-men of Blue Pegasus, who tell them that they have recently discovered a change in the magical energy around the waters where Tenrou Island once stood. There they discover that the island was protected against Acnologia`s attack by the spirit of Mavis Vermilion, who used her power to help everyone on the island cast the defensive Fairy Sphere spell that inadvertently caused them to be frozen in time for seven years. The missing members return to their guild, drive the members of Twilight Ogre away, and reunite with their friends and Romeo is finally smiling after seeing Natsu, Lucy and the others again.

titles.title: X791年・妖精の尻尾[フェアリーテイル]

REGULAR.description: The members of Lamia Scale visit Fairy Tail as they celebrate their friends` return. Gray learns from Lyon what had happened to Ultear and Meredy over the past seven years, while Erza learns the same about Jellal. Makarov, Erza, and Mirajane later visit the Twilight Ogre guild and take revenge for being bullied by them. Meanwhile, Lucy is kicked out of her house for being unable to pay her rent for seven years. She decides to visit her father Jude, only to learn he had died one month before she and her friends returned from Tenrou Island. She is allowed to return to her house by her landlady, who reveals to her seven years worth of birthday presents and rent money from her father, who had also left a letter detailing his unwavering hope that she was alive. Realizing her father truly loved her, Lucy admits her own love for her father.

Natsu, Lucy, and their friends take a job to capture Velveno, an escaped convict with the power to transform into other people and mimic their magic, who plans to attend a ball held by the wealthy Count Balsamico for his daughter Aceto to find a husband. It is assumed by the count that Velveno is there to steal the valuable Balsamico family ring. The Fairy Tail members fail to capture him before he obtains the ring, but he instead uses it to propose to Aceto as he is in love with her. Aceto accepts his proposal on the condition that he turn himself in for his crimes, which he does, though it costs Fairy Tail their reward for the job.

Natsu, Lucy, and Wendy keep watch over a gold-carrying train, which is hijacked by a trio of large-buttocked thieves called the Jiggle Butt Gang. The three use Natsu`s motion sickness to their advantage to get rid of Lucy, Happy, and Carla, leaving Wendy the only one able to defend the train`s cargo. She manages to impress them with her powers and tries to talk them out of their thieving ways, but once the train stops and Natsu recovers, Natsu sends them flying before she has a chance.

titles.title: A Verdadeiramente Maléfica Gangue do Traseiro Ridículo
Ketsupuri, le gang des pures crapules
True Scoundrels: The Butt Jiggle Gang

REGULAR.description: Lucy bathes with a magical lotion she created seven years ago, only to find that its effects have changed over the years to turn her entire body invisible. She turns to her friends for help, but their attempts to make her visible again by painting on her and masking her fail. Eventually the lotion`s effects become so severe that they cause Lucy to disappear together with everyone`s memories of her as if she had never existed. Fortunately, Natsu is able to remember his friendship with Lucy, allowing everyone to recall her back into existence. As Happy hugs Lucy in joy, however, she accidentally spills the lotion bottle over everyone else, turning all of them invisible.

Michelle, a girl claiming to be Lucy`s relative, visits Fairy Tail and gives Lucy a briefcase containing a large metallic rod, which she says is a memento from Lucy`s late father. Because Michelle is an orphan and has nowhere else to go, Lucy takes Michelle in and suggests she start working at Fairy Tail. While adjusting to life at the guild, Michelle suggests that Lucy send a request to investigate the key. After Michelle accidentally drops the rod, it levitates into the air and a set of glowing symbols appears upon it. Makarov becomes suspicious and warns Lucy not to involve herself with the rod any further, though Lucy remains determined to find out what her father asked of her.

Natsu and Gajeel challenge the still-exiled Laxus to a fight. Wendy suggests they have a showdown the next day in the hopes that they will calm down and lose interest, but it only excites the rest of the guild, who hold a festival for it. Almost as soon as their battle starts, however, Laxus beats Natsu with a single punch and Gajeel runs away in fear. While the rest of the town searches for Gajeel, the guild is visited by three figures resembling Hughes, Sugar Boy, and Coco from Edolas. Meanwhile, Lucy decodes the writing on the rod with Levy`s help and discovers that it is the hand of a legendary clock.

titles.title: Batalha à vista! Natsu vs. Laxus!
Dotou no Taiketsu! Natsu vs. Laxus
Natsu contre Luxus ! Le duel des enragés !
怒涛の対決! ナツvs.ラクサス

REGULAR.description: The three visiting wizards, who turn out to be the Earthland counterparts of Hughes (a woman named Mary Hughes), Sugar Boy, and Coco, battle Fairy Tail and demand to hand Lucy over to them. Michelle passes herself off as Lucy to protect her, prompting the rest of the guild to confuse the three into thinking that all of the females at Fairy Tail are Lucy so she and Michelle can escape. However, Hughes chases the two and forces them off the edge of a cliff.

It`s Natsu versus Sugar Boy! Wendy and Lily versus Coco! Lucy versus Hughes! And Gildarts versus Byro! But are the members of Legion really after Lucy... or something else?!
Source: crunchyroll

After Legion makes off with Lucy`s key, the only thing the members of Fairy Tail can do is search for clues to figure out Legion`s objective and the purpose of the memento from Lucy`s father. They head to Lucy`s old family mansion, but as soon as they discover a hint, two more Legionnaires crash the party... and one of them is an Exceed!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s a race against time as the members of Fairy Tail split up into groups to find the scattered pieces of the mystical clock before Legion, but they run into all manner of obstacles. Nor does it help that Natsu is currently a doll-sized version of himself!
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu and Lucy`s team explore the ancient ruins of the Sacred Graveyard, going ever downward as they get through each floor`s challenge. Meanwhile, in an interdimensional space, Gray, Juvia, and Lyon are in a desperate battle with Sugar Boy over the first piece of the mysterious clock!
Source: crunchyroll

The Fairy Tail teams get ever closer to the clock parts, but two Legion members have already shown up to challenge Natsu`s team! And that means more size-changing shenanigans, deathtraps, and unlikely allies than you can throw a stick at!
Source: crunchyroll

They`re back by no one`s demand! The Jiggle Butt Gang is committing more fragrant fouls (or is that "foul fragrances") than ever before, which stinks because they`re doing it right in the faces of Erza and Wendy! Meanwhile, the only thing that can possibly break up the brawl between Natsu and Dan... is Lucy?! Oh, and... clock parts are finally discovered!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le retour du diable en personne

REGULAR.description:
The Fairy Tail teams have located the scattered clock parts, but keeping them out of the hands of Legion is another thing entirely! Dan Straight chases Lucy around in one location while Panther Lily and Samuel have an Exceed-ingly ferocious battle in another. Meanwhile, Gajeel and Shadow Gear contend with a giant stone guardian below.
Source: crunchyroll

Mary Hughes breaks a taboo by unleashing her ultimate power! Can Mirajane out-ultimate her? Plus, Natsu takes on a giant octopus! And... the debut of the Jiggle Jugs Gang?! (Warning: It`s not as appealing as it sounds...)
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Course of the Holy War

REGULAR.description:
Natsu gives all he`s got against a Legion of one: Byro Cracy, who has the power to nullify all magic! Will the other Fairy Tail groups get there in time to pitch in? Or will this be... the beginning of the end?
Source: crunchyroll

Just when it looks Fairy Tail is about to have a climactic fight with Byro over the Infinity Clock, Oracion Seis returns, with upgraded powers and a desire to make the ominous clock their own!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新生六魔将軍[オラシオンセイス]現る!

REGULAR.description:
Oracion Seis has made off with the Infinity Clock and seems intent on counting down to doomsday. Meanwhile, Fairy Tail regroups, using Cana`s divination skills to locate Oracion Seis`s targets and choose the best teams to go after them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: À la poursuite de l’horloge infinie !
無限時計[むげんどけい]を追え!

REGULAR.description:
Doranbolt... or is that Mest Gryder?... returns! But whose side is he on this time? Meanwhile, teamwork isn`t working out for Natsu, Elfman, and Lucy against the threat of Jackpot! Likewise, new partners Erza and Evergreen just can`t get along!
Source: crunchyroll

Mest and Lahar meet the mystery person that Zentopia has been hiding... or is that hunting down? Gray and Fried face off against one of the Six Generals (and Dan Straight`s new object of adoration), Angel! Meanwhile, Erza, Evergreen, and Max are confounded by Cobra, master of sound!
Source: crunchyroll

Oracion Seis`s true plan comes to light! Michelle Lobster isn`t who she seems to be! And for that matter, neither is Jackpot!
Source: crunchyroll

Natsu is imprisoned inside the Zentopia stronghold... along with the Jiggle Butt Gang! Back home, the Fairy Tail wizards are visited by a few members of the Archaeological Society, who shed some light on the Infinity Clock and what it does. Finally, Oracion Seis has Lucy and are going to use her as the final element to activate "Real Nightmare"!
Source: crunchyroll

Cardinal Rapowant`s devious plans begin coming to fruition as time itself warps, affecting even the Fairy Tail members aboard Ichiya`s Christina. En route to rescue Natsu and Lucy, they become children, elderly, and even different species!
Source: crunchyroll

As Natsu and other Fairy Tail members race to save Lucy before she`s sacrificed by the new Oracion Seis, Gildarts has a non-magic showdown with Byro. They also learn the secret of Cardinal Rapowant, that even he didn`t know!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En route vers le château infini !

REGULAR.description:
In order to save Lucy, the last four members of the new Oracion Seis must be defeated! And one of them is Angel, whose powers seem more demonic than anything as she summons fearsome angels to destroy Gray. When the lovestruck Dan Straight intervenes, will he be a help or hindrance, and to whom?!
Source: crunchyroll

The battle to rescue Lucy from the Infinity Clock rages on, but it may be too late as Lucy becomes one with the clock! Plus, the climactic battle between Erza and Cobra!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Hear the Voice of My Friend
J`entends la voix de mes amis

REGULAR.description:
Only Brain II is left standing between Natsu and Lucy, but he`s the most powerful of the Six Generals! Also, learn the secret history of Lucy and Michelle in this epic finale to the Key of the Starry Heavens arc!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ルーシィとミッシェル

REGULAR.description:
Legion pays Fairy Tail a special visit! Fairy Tail learns of Sabertooth, the number one guild in Fiore! And what lies beneath the original Fairy Tail base of operations?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 剣咬の虎[セイバートゥース]

REGULAR.description:
When Natsu and some others from the "Tenrou group" visit apothecary hermit Poluchka to see if they can get some medicine to become stronger, Wendy senses something extremely familiar about the misanthropic old woman. Also, the next master of Fairy Tail is chosen (for real) and another important decision is made that could elevate the guild`s dismal reputation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: And So We Aim for the Top
Soshite Oretachi wa Choujou o Mezasu
そしてオレたちは頂上を目指す

REGULAR.description:
Fairy Tail`s best is back, but to rock the Grand Magic Games, they`ve got to make up seven years worth of time in only 3 months! It`s time for some seriously hard training! But before that, a little party in the Spirit World can`t hurt, right?
Source: crunchyroll

There are only five days left `til the Grand Magic Games begin, but Natsu and company still aren`t ready for it. But then they meet up with Crime Sorciere, a small, independent guild led by an old frenemy. The members of this newish guild promise to help Fairy Tail "power up" in exchange for a favor...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For All the Time We Missed Each Other
Juste le temps de se croiser
すれ違った時間の分だけ

REGULAR.description:
Five members of Fairy Tail are selected to participate in the Grand Magic Games. They make their way to Crocus, the capital of Fiore, where their rivals are gathering, too. As pre-Games tensions abound, Erza has a sneaking suspicion about the whole setup...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 花咲く都・クロッカス

REGULAR.description:
In the elimination round, Natsu and the others have to make their way through the Sky Labyrinth, a giant mind-bending maze full of rotating walls and vicious rivals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 空中迷宮[スカイラビリンス]

REGULAR.description:
The eight participating guilds of the Grand Magic Games are introduced! Along with Fairy Tail, there are old friends and rivals, old and new enemies... and at least one team that`s completely unexpected!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s "Hidden", the opening game of the Grand Magic Games, and Gray finds that it`s like playing cat and mouse. Unfortunately, he`s the "mouse" as he keeps getting picked off by a member of Raven Tail!
Source: crunchyroll

In the first battle of the first day of the Magic Games, Lucy is pitted against Raven Tail`s Flare, whose long locks are deadly. But when Flare doesn`t play fair, Lucy is forced to grin and bear it or risk a friend getting hurt!
Source: crunchyroll

There are more one-on-one battles on the first day of the Grand Magic Games, culminating with the mysterious "Mystogan" versus Jura! Will a Fairy Tail team finally get points?! Or will Mystogan`s real identity be revealed, blowing his secret mission?!
Source: crunchyroll

The second day begins with a chariot race of a sort, obviously not the best event for Natsu as his motion sickness kicks in right away! Surprisingly, though, he`s not alone as two more participants suffer from the same affliction!
Source: crunchyroll

In the ring, Elfman is forced to face Bacchus, a "drunken fighter" considered to be Erza`s equal! Meanwhile, Natsu wakes up in the infirmary to discover that Wendy and Carla have been kidnapped!
Source: crunchyroll
The second day of the Grand Magic Games continues, with Mirajane of Fairy Tail Team B fighting against Jenny Realight of Team Blue Pegasus.

titles.title: ミラジェーンvs.ジェニー

REGULAR.description: Yukino is revealed to be a Celestial Spirit wizard when she summons Libra and Pisces to attack Kagura.
After Yukino is expelled from Sabertooth, she offers to relinquish her two Golden Gatekeys to Lucy to complete the latter`s collection of the Zodiac Gatekeys.

titles.title: La rancœur enveloppée dans les voiles de la nuit
Urami wa Yoru no Tobari ni Tsutsumarete
怨みは夜の帳に包まれて

REGULAR.description: After Natsu punches out Dobengal, the guild member summoned to fight him, he and Jiemma engage in a duel. However, the guild master`s daughter Minerva appears, ends their duel and, taking Happy hostage, convinces Natsu to settle their dispute in the Grand Magic Games.

titles.title: 伏魔殿[パンデモニウム]

REGULAR.description: Erza kills the 100 monsters using various types of armor to match their strength and weaknesses. As a result, the crowd praises Fairy Tail, and the guild is awarded with 10 points.

In the battle portion of the Grand Magic Games` third day, Milliana of Mermaid Heel beats Semmes of Quatro Puppy while Sabertooth`s Rufus swiftly defeats Blue Pegasus` Eve. For the third match, Laxus of Fairy Tail Team B is chosen to battle against Alexei of Team Raven Tail.

After Laxus defeats Ivan and the four Raven Tail elite members, Ivan`s illusions disappear to the shock of everyone in the stadium. The game officials declare Laxus the victor, and Ivan tells him that Lumen Histoire is Fairy Tail’s `darkness`.

titles.title: ウェンディ vs. シェリア

REGULAR.description: With Cheria being fully healed and Wendy being almost depleted of magic power, their battle continues, with the former casting a high-level spell towards the latter. However, it seems that Wendy enhances Cheria`s physical strength, causing the attack to gain much force and thus missing Wendy.

As the jubilant Fairy Tail members celebrate their victories, the other people, such as Sting, Kagura, and Milliana, are contemplating on their own concerns, while Yukino is enlisted as a sergeant under Arcadios` command.
While Lucy is hospitalized and taken to the infirmary, the Fairy Tail members warn Sabertooth that they have angered the worst possible guild to do so.

titles.title: Le parfume que je te dédie
君に捧げる香り[パルファム]

REGULAR.description: Mermaid Heel`s Kagura and Milliana and Lamia Scale`s Lyon and Yuka face off for the second tag battle of the games.

titles.title: La bataille des chasseurs de dragons
バトル・オブ・ドラゴンスレイヤー

REGULAR.description: The tag battle continues, with Sting and Rogue beginning to attack Natsu and Gajeel with their powers being increased.

The tag battle of the Dragon Slayers comes to a close, with Natsu intrepidly overpowering the combined attacks of Sting and Rogue. The Sabertooth members watch in dismay, whilst Jiemma seethes in anger over the defeat of the Twin Dragons, causing the nearby spectators to be frightened away.

6232.name: character related tags which need deleting or merging
